actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend the survivor benefit plan provided for under title 10 of the United States Code to make any surviving spouse eligible for an annuity thereunder if married to the retiree at least 1 year before the retiree's death.

summary.text: Makes the surviving spouse of an Armed Forces retiree eligible for an annuity under the Survivor Benefit Plan if married to the retiree at least one year before the retiree's death.

titles.title: A bill to amend the survivor benefit plan provided for under title 10 of the United States Code to make any surviving spouse eligible for an annuity thereunder if married to the retiree at least 1 year before the retiree's death.
